completed_features: Initialize the Next.js 14+ project structure with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS configuration. This includes creating `package.json`, `tsconfig.json`, `tailwind.config.ts`, and the root `app/layout.tsx` to establish the basic HTML structure and global font settings.
last_commit:
feat: initialize Next.js 14+ project with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS

- Create package.json with all required dependencies (Next.js 14+, React, TypeScript, Tailwind, Lucide React, React Hook Form, CVA, Framer Motion)
- Configure TypeScript with strict mode and path aliases (@/*)
- Set up Tailwind CSS configuration with content paths
- Create root layout with global font optimization
- Add basic home page and global styles
- Configure ESLint with Next.js recommended rules
